author: controlcthenv
content:
I am starting my contributions to the Verkle efforts, just to make sure my work is going to the right place 

I assume I should be directing my commits towards

Go Library for Verkle Trees - https://github.com/gballet/go-verkle
and
Rust Library for Verkle Trees - https://github.com/crate-crypto/rust-verkle

and then does the condrieu testnet still need testing nodes?
